sentences.sContent: Many years ago there lived an Emperor who laid so great a value upon new clothes that he spent all his money on them in order to be smartly dressed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many years ago there lived an Emperor who laid so great a value upon new clothes that he spent all his money on them in order to be smartly dressed.
sentences.sCn: 很久很久以前，有一位皇帝，他是如此的看重新衣服，以至于把他所有的钱都花在上面，以使得自己能穿得潇洒漂亮。

sentences.sContent: The Sergeant threw the frayed sheaf of football-pool coupons aside and snatched the radio. He saluted smartly, his huge belly juggling like a water gourd.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Sergeant threw the frayed sheaf of football-pool coupons aside and snatched the radio. He saluted smartly, his huge belly juggling like a water gourd.
sentences.sCn: 警官将凌乱的足球彩票扔到一边抓起了对话机，他潇洒地敬了个礼，巨大的肚子晃得就像一个水葫芦。

synos.tran: 刺痛地；漂亮地；潇洒地；火辣辣地

words.tran: 聪明的；巧妙的；敏捷的；厉害的；潇洒的；剧烈的
